issue.title: [CF 1284] Add a Q&A section to forums
issue.body:
Since currently forums only have example sections, there is no place to ask general questions, and I find myself opening unnecessary tickets because I don't know anywhere else I can ask. I'm assuming this creates unnecessary distractions from real issues/ideas.


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg | Imported from CurseForge issue #1284 | Raw

comments.body:
If you want to ask me a question, a ticket is by far the best place to ask it. I never read the forums (and can't get emails for forum posts), the comments on curse.com are impossible to follow, and PMs don't allow anyone who is Googling to find answers I give there.

Edited Aug 27, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
